alert.note: Alert for McPherson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:27PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Brown and northeastern McPherson Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 327 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Sand Lake Wildlife Refuge to near Frederick to near Grassland Colony. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elm Lake, Spring Creek Colony and Forbes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
